description: Are you an awesome teacher, but not yet adapted to the virtual world? You have know idea how you can share your expertise online and earn some money by doing that? You are not sure if this online teaching really works?  Well, this is the course for you!  First, you will understand the advantages of being an online teacher and why you should pursue it yourself.  Then, you will get to know the platforms you can use to teach your classes.  After that, you will learn the tools you can use to have live interaction with your students.  Finally, you will hear some awesome tips to develop better relationships with your students and with the tools you are using.
title: Learn how to teach live online classes in less than 1 hour
